system.description:
The changes the experiments have made do not begin and end at spellcasting, unfortunately. At level 1 your flesh and bone become tougher, and occasionally scaled, providing a bonus to your armor class when you are unarmored. Choose from the following options:

  • Stone Eye: Your AC when not wearing armor is 12 + Dex
  • Beastmantle: Your AC when not wearing armor is 14 + Dex (Maximum 2)
  • Shapeshifter: Your AC when not wearing armor is 12 + Cha
